caption:
This photograph appears to be an aerial view of a rural industrial area surrounded by lush, green forests. In the lower part of the image, there is a dark body of water which somewhat reflects the sky and has patches of vegetation peeking out of it. The middle of the photograph features an industrial complex with several buildings and what look like smokestacks emitting plumes of smoke or steam, contributing to a slight haze over the area.

A network of roads connects different parts of the industrial facility and spreads out into the surrounding area, where small clusters of residential houses can be seen. The community seems sparsely populated, with significant distances between the dwellings, interspersed with areas of greenery. In contrast to the industrial middle, the broader landscape is heavily wooded, indicating a region rich in natural resources.

The sky above is filled with wispy clouds against a bright blue backdrop, suggesting a fair weather day. The horizon towards the upper part of the image fades into a blur of forest-covered mountains or hills in the distance, providing a natural boundary to the human activity below. The overall impression is of an isolated industrial operation within a vast natural forested landscape.
title: Aerial view of the Kitsap County town of silverdale.  This community and others in the area will be affected by population growth when the navy's proposed trident submarine base is built nearby
